messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1104
messages.msgSnippet: That is very scary. Maybe thats why some people don t let their kids go on sleep overs. I would have never thought of something like that. Sick minds ... From:
messages.messageBody:
That is very scary. Maybe thats why some people don't let their kids go on sleep overs. I would have never thought of something like that. Sick minds
 
----- Original Message -----
From: megates@...
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, April 08, 2001 5:58 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1104

I know a 10 year old who found strange photos of her own friends in her
dad's room.  She called 911 and her dad is now in jail for a looong time.
Turns out he was giving them sleeping pills and molesting them during
sleepovers.  I never met this man myself, but everything I'd heard about
him to that point indicated that he was a good father.

<snip>My mom told me early on, "Always tell the truth, even if it were to
mean that
me or your dad would have to go to jail because of it." 

Mary Ellen
One thing at a time...
